name: Team Super Panda
description:
Team Super Panda - The Game

This is the origin story of how Team Super Panda formed.

The animals need your help! We have some bad friends in the neighbourhood known as 'The Evil Guys' and they are cutting down all the trees.

You play as Panda and need to help the nearby animals. Once you have helped the animals to solve their problems then maybe by joining forces you could take down the Evil Guys.
